Package edu.fau.COT4930

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.fau.COT4930.Deck
  • public class Deck
extends Object
    This class creates the deck of cards for the game
    Author:
    Daniel Leach

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Deck​(Component comp, String fileCards)
      Deck Constructor sets the component and image file.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void CreateDeck()
      The Create deck method Creates the deck by importing the file, crop image by suit and rank enlarge each new cropped image add new enlarged image to deck array
      Card getCardBack()
      The getCardBack method gets the back card image from the back deck list
      Card getNextCardInDeck()
      getNextCardInDeck method gets next card in deck
      int getNumberLeftInDeck()
      The getNumberLeftInDeck method gets number of cards left in deck
      void shuffle()
      The shuffle method shuffles the deck and makes the deck whole

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck​(Component comp,
            String fileCards)
        Deck Constructor sets the component and image file. the constructor also calls the CreateDeck method
        Parameters:
        comp - This represents a Component object
        fileCards - This represents a String for file location
        See Also:
        CreateDeck()

    • Method Detail

      • CreateDeck

        public void CreateDeck()
        The Create deck method Creates the deck by importing the file, crop image by suit and rank enlarge each new cropped image add new enlarged image to deck array

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        The shuffle method shuffles the deck and makes the deck whole

      • getNextCardInDeck

        public Card getNextCardInDeck()
        getNextCardInDeck method gets next card in deck
        Returns:
        a card object from the list of card objects

      • getNumberLeftInDeck

        public int getNumberLeftInDeck()
        The getNumberLeftInDeck method gets number of cards left in deck
        Returns:
        an integer of the number of card objects left in the deck

      • getCardBack

        public Card getCardBack()
        The getCardBack method gets the back card image from the back deck list
        Returns:
        a card object with no value or suit with the back image
